attributes.action: Restore Channel4 HD to Freesat, as part of their Public Service Broadcast remit.
attributes.background: Today Channel4 HD ceased to be available through Freesat, and I wish to see it restored as part of their Public Service Broadcasting requirement, under the 1982 Charter.

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision taken by Channel 4. You can find out more here:

http://www.channel4.com/4viewers/faq/name/c4hd-on-freesat/id/505218504
